subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Joe Morgan, the former Red Sox manager, was on hand in 1981 when Boston’s minor league team in Pawtucket, R.I., played a 33-inning game — though he was ejected in the 22nd.
snippet: Joe Morgan, the former Red Sox manager, was on hand in 1981 when Boston’s minor league team in Pawtucket, R.I., played a 33-inning game — though he was ejected in the 22nd.
